item.title: Volunteers Needed for Discovery Day at Oracle Park
item.dc:creator: Dylan Romero
item.description:
Discovery Day is coming up and we are looking for a few more volunteers from the Library! Discovery Day is an annual UCSF sponsored event scheduled on Saturday, November 2 (9:30am-5pm) at Oracle Park. We are looking for 2-3 more volunteers to staff a 2.5-hour shift at the Library’s table. ...

Read moreVolunteers Needed for Discovery Day at Oracle Park

item.title: Makers Lab Expansion
item.dc:creator: Dylan Romero
item.description:
The Makers Lab is expanding into room 355 this fall! The carpets in room 355 will be removed on Monday, September 16. We expect to complete the expansion before the end of September. Below are main takeaways for Library staff: Staff will no longer be able to reserve room 355 ...

item.title: What’s Happening in the Makers Lab
item.dc:creator: Dylan Romero
item.description:
The Makers Lab opened three years ago and the community of makers at UCSF continues to grow. We know everyone is busy working away in the Library, so I want to take a moment to share a few updates. As a reminder, here is an interview discussing the role of ...

item.title: Welcome Makers Lab Technician, Jenny Tai!
item.dc:creator: Dylan Romero
item.description:
You may remember that I introduced new Makers Lab staff member Jenny Tai back in April on Off the Shelf. Well, I am excited to announce that Jenny has accepted the Makers Lab Technician position and will be working full-time in the Makers Lab starting this week. Jenny will help ...

item.title: Now Hiring: Makers Lab Technician
item.dc:creator: Dylan Romero
item.description:
The Library is hiring for a Makers Lab Technician position. If you know of anyone with experience in educational technology with an emphasis on emerging tech, design, or crafts, please encourage them to apply. The full-time position will provide technical support for the Makers Lab, guiding UCSF community members to ...

item.title: New Makers Lab Staff – Jenny Tai
item.dc:creator: Dylan Romero
item.description:
You may have asked yourself, who is the new person making that awesome withdrawn book art in the Makers Lab? Well that’s Jenny Tai, who will be helping out on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays in the Makers Lab. Jenny brings great experience from her studies in Cognitive Science, Human-Computer Interaction ...

item.title: Staff Engagement Survey Starts Today!
item.dc:creator: Dylan Romero
item.description:
You should have received an email this morning from Gallup containing a personalized link to this year’s Staff Engagement Survey. If you did not receive this email, please let me know! As you know, Griffin and I are your friendly survey ambassadors this year. We are here to help with ...
